creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black and white striped band with fringe at each end; black beaded fabric panel at one end, decorated with round wheel-like flowers and birds with tails of various styles; round and tube-shaped beads; contemporary paper sticker: "MADE IN/ GUATEMALA/ 100% COTTON"
title: Hair band or belt (?)
